doc.field: Record Books for Hancock Mutual Insurance Company, 1853 - 1858
Record Books for Hancock Mutual Insurance Company, 1853 - 1858

[{"library":"Law School","location":"STACKS","call_number":"MSS-91-7 Ledger MSS 91-7","barcode":"AS:4C11373","special_collections_location":"Law School, Basement, Special Collections Storage, Oversized Files Cabinet [Law Oversized Materials]"}]

COLLECTION DESCRIPTION & ARRANGEMENT These two ledgers were kept by a Castine, Maine, fire and marine insurance company in the 1850's. The first volume begins with a handwritten copy of the 1852 act of incorporation, followed by records of the trustees' meetings through 1858. The second volume contains abstracts of policies from 1853-1855, and records of open policies for 1855. Each volume also held a number of loose items.

ACQUISITION INFORMATION DATE RECEIVED 1991 DONOR INFORMATION These ledgers were purchased from Robert Rubin in 1991.
